svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 12, 2024" date: "2024-10-11"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
* Eth R&D protocol call focused on execution layer (ACDE #198): Pectra upgrade:
Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week
EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs Public testnet :
launch by Devcon Proposed EIPs: EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement
without an upgrade EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob
count EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
* Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed Pectra-devnet-4 : plan
to launch next week EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs
Public testnet : launch by Devcon
Pectra upgrade:
* Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed
Pectra-devnet-3 : issues being found & fixed
* Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week
Pectra-devnet-4 : plan to launch next week
* EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs
EIP2537 BLS precompile : breakout to finalize gas pricing & specs
* Public testnet : launch by Devcon
* Proposed EIPs: EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an
upgrade EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
Proposed EIPs:
* EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade
EIP7783 gradually increase gas limit : can implement without an upgrade
* EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8 seconds : alternative to raising blob count
* EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
EIP4444 : Nethermind continuing Portal network integration
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Base blob increase proposal : recommends target of 5 & max of 8 blobs (up from 3/6),
implementing engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT and disabling flood publishing
Base blob increase proposal : recommends target of 5 & max of 8 blobs (up from 3/6),
* Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.8 : pectra-devnet-4 target
Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.8 : pectra-devnet-4 target
* Weekly testing call #8
Weekly testing call #8
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
* Peerdas-devnet-3 : launched with peerdas-devnet-2 spec, issue caused clients to be on
different forks
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , moving away from 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , moving away from 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* Vitalik: surgical EVM scaling , EVMMAX + SIMD and reduce some opcode gas costs
Vitalik: surgical EVM scaling , EVMMAX + SIMD and reduce some opcode gas costs
* EIP7732 ePBS: ePBS breakout #11 : Prysm aim to launch devnet in 2 weeks
EIP7732 ePBS:
* ePBS breakout #11 : Prysm aim to launch devnet in 2 weeks
Research
* Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL): Terence: transaction invalidation in
FOCIL & impact on block producers/verifiers Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing
inclusion list construction rights is not individually profitable
Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL):
* Terence: transaction invalidation in FOCIL & impact on block producers/verifiers
Terence: transaction invalidation in FOCIL & impact on block producers/verifiers
* Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing inclusion list construction rights is not
individually profitable
Uncrowdability of FOCIL : outsourcing inclusion list construction rights is not
* Silent threshold encryption combined with ZK or TEEs to remove MEV-Boost relays
Silent threshold encryption combined with ZK or TEEs to remove MEV-Boost relays
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Teku v24.10.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT support and
disabled flood publishing; v24.10.1 : hotfix for validators proposer config that
prevented startup in v24.10.0
Consensus layer:
* Teku v24.10.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT support and disabled flood
publishing; v24.10.1 : hotfix for validators proposer config that prevented startup in
* Execution layer: Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for
high-paying transactions & addresses Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default
(except op-reth), new metrics & RPC improvements
Execution layer:
* Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for high-paying
transactions & addresses
Nethermind v1.29.0 : adds heuristics-based censorship detection for high-paying
* Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default (except op-reth), new metrics & RPC
improvements
Reth v1.1.0 : Engine 2.0 enabled by default (except op-reth), new metrics & RPC
Layer 2
* Flashbots Rollup-Boost : block building using TEEs, starting with 250ms Flashblocks
(partial blocks) and priority ordering
Flashbots Rollup-Boost : block building using TEEs, starting with 250ms Flashblocks
* L2 standards meeting (RollCall #8): RIP7755 cross-L2 calls presentation, Pectra
upgrade expected Q1 2025 (optimistically February) & upcoming breakout on future of EVM
on L2
L2 standards meeting (RollCall #8): RIP7755 cross-L2 calls presentation, Pectra upgrade
expected Q1 2025 (optimistically February) & upcoming breakout on future of EVM on L2
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak
bandwidth EIP7783 : Add controlled gas limit increase strategy EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT
opcode
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak bandwidth
EIP7782 : Reduce slot time for lower peak bandwidth
* EIP7783 : Add controlled gas limit increase strategy
EIP7783 : Add controlled gas limit increase strategy
* EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT opcode
EIP7784 : GETCONTRACT opcode
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7785 : Onchain registration of chain identifiers
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7785 : Onchain registration of chain identifiers
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.8.28 : adds transient storage state variables for value types, generates
JSON for Yul ASTs on demand to reduce memory usage and adds ability to request
bytecode/IR for subset of contracts
Solidity v0.8.28 : adds transient storage state variables for value types, generates
* RareSkills: storage slots for dynamic types in Solidity (mappings, arrays, strings &
bytes)
RareSkills: storage slots for dynamic types in Solidity (mappings, arrays, strings &
* Circom v2.2.0 : adds buses (groups related signals under one name)
Circom v2.2.0 : adds buses (groups related signals under one name)
* Circuitscan : submit/browse verified Circom circuits
Circuitscan : submit/browse verified Circom circuits
Security
* EigenLayer $6M stolen via compromised investor email thread, token vesting not
enforced onchain but via legal documents
Ecosystem
* Ethereum Foundation EcoDev research fellowships (6 months), deadline November 15
Ethereum Foundation EcoDev research fellowships (6 months), deadline November 15
* Hackathon projects: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur & ETHRome
Hackathon projects: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur & ETHRome
Enterprise
* Stripe Pay with Crypto : US businesses can accept USDC on mainnet, settled in USD
Job Listings
* Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
* Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
* Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.3 gwei 7k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 1.9 to 129.9 gwei, 15.1 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
* 7k ETH net issuance this week
7k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,346 - $2,504, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,346 - $2,504, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* ZKP2P Tickets : lower fee secondary market for Ticketmaster, zk proof of transfer
Regulation/business/tokens
* SEC: Crypto.com received Wells notice Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating
as an unregistered dealer
SEC:
* Crypto.com received Wells notice
Crypto.com received Wells notice
* Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating as an unregistered dealer
Cumberland DRW charged for allegedly operating as an unregistered dealer
* FTX bankruptcy plan approved , customers to receive cash for 118% on average of
holdings value at the time of bankruptcy
FTX bankruptcy plan approved , customers to receive cash for 118% on average of
* FBI charge projects & market makers for market manipulation & wash trading, NexF
token created on mainnet as part of investigation
FBI charge projects & market makers for market manipulation & wash trading, NexF token
created on mainnet as part of investigation
General
* TD Bank plead guilty to US Bank Secrecy Act & money laundering conspiracy violations,
$1.8B in penalties, no individuals charged
TD Bank plead guilty to US Bank Secrecy Act & money laundering conspiracy violations,
* US broadband attack linked to China, may have had access to wiretap infrastructure
US broadband attack linked to China, may have had access to wiretap infrastructure
* Internet Archive Wayback Machine offline after DDoS attack & data breach
Internet Archive Wayback Machine offline after DDoS attack & data breach
* WHIR : IOP of proximity for constrained Reed-Solomon codes, verifier runs in hundreds
of microseconds
WHIR : IOP of proximity for constrained Reed-Solomon codes, verifier runs in hundreds
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-12-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Oct 16 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 22 , OSS application deadline
Oct 16 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 22 , OSS application deadline
* Oct 17-19 â€“ ETHSofia conference & hackathon
Oct 17-19 â€“ ETHSofia conference & hackathon
* Oct 18-20 â€“ ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
Oct 18-20 â€“ ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
* Oct 25-27 â€“ ETHSydney hackathon
Oct 25-27 â€“ ETHSydney hackathon
* Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
* Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
* Dec 6-8 â€“ ETHIndia hackathon
Dec 6-8 â€“ ETHIndia hackathon
